name: Hestia
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Hestia you can Enchant up to
{fire}{fire}{fire} to it. You can Disenchant {fire}{fire} from this
Hestia in order to Special Cast a 1 Spirit {fire} Elestral
from your hand with {fire} if an opponent controls
the same number of Elestrals as you or more.
effect: When you Cast this Hestia you can Enchant up to {fire}{fire}{fire} to it. You can Disenchant {fire}{fire} from this Hestia in order to Special Cast a 1 Spirit {fire} Elestral from your hand with {fire} if an opponent controls the same number of Elestrals as you or more.
